definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
We wish you long life and riches! (idiom, conventional greeting)
may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live
the Yellow River is clear and the sea is calm/the world is at peace (idiom)
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
to become Emperor by the grace of Heaven/to "receive the Mandate of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
golden seal/characters tattooed on a convict's face
lit. lovely flowers, round moon (idiom); fig. everything is wonderful/perfect happiness/conjugal bliss
the whole world at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony
a flourishing period/period of prosperity/a golden age
